definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote
to move (from one residence to another)
to settle (in some city, country etc)/to take up residence
to attend (a school)/to drop out (of college etc)
to register as domiciled in another land/naturalization
accompanied by one's dependents/encumbered by wife and children
stable household, established profession (idiom); settled and comfortably off
to send sb abroad at the government's expense
one's office/place where one holds a post
